rows.name: Unloading of Goods

More goods have arrived from Superbia
than expected and work is
behind schedule. Do you have any
strong Blades who could help?
Crane Repairs

The port's salvaging crane is broken,
and we can't keep working without it.
We're short on repairmen right now,
so could you lend a hand?
Salvaging Security

There have been lots of monster
attacks on salvagers lately, leaving
them all on edge. Can you keep the
salvagers safe while they work?
Nopon Veggie Stir-Fry

Me want to make favorite treat for
littlepons, but not have enough heat
for cooking! Can friends help with
heating up veggies very hot?
Canteen Job

We got a big reservation, so we need
some temp staff, but we're awfully
short on waitresses. Wonder if there's
anybody suitable out there...
Port Pest Problem

A merchant ship's cargo hold has been
invaded by Lysaat and can't set
sail. The situation's bad for business,
so it needs sorting soon.
Grounded Ship Rescue

A merchant ship ran aground. We've
managed to float it, but it's in a sorry
state, so we need some mercenary help
to see to repairs.
Ship Snooping

It look like there merchant ship trading
with no permission of Trade Guild.
What cheek! Need someone to catch
naughty traders and teach them lesson!
Avoiding Heavy Losses

Important negotiation documents been
lost. Could mean heavy loss! Need to
search through goods and find them!
Money, Money, Money

Me hear nectar of Shifflower on Shiffon
Island can make young again! This sure
to fetch amazing price! Friends find out
best spots for getting nectar please!
Flying Monsters

Puffots are after the fruit in the cargo
on deck. They're nimble blighters,
flitting all over the place... Do you have
any Blades who could catch them?
Big Catch Opportunity

Big shoal of fish show up in Beeching
Cloud Sea! Need friends to help catch
many fish, make big profit!
Crane Protection

Salvaging crane get tangled up with
massive Serprond from Cloud Sea!
Me need friends take care of monster
before crane go wrecky-wreck...
Nopon News

We short on stories for newspaper.
Go ask around gossipers for news and
rumors! Me wait here for juicy stories!
Deck Duty

My deck duty hours were increased,
and now I barely get to spend any time
with my son. Could someone stand in
for me so I can play with him for a bit?
Sunken Ship Survey

Me found sunken ship while out sailing!
Much potential for treasure and
adventure methinks! Need mercs to
help me check out inside of wreckage!
Big Ship Escort

Me need friends to protect Momon
Trade Guild ship that carry important
Nopon things. Hear enemies nearby
mostly weak to electricky.
Cooking Up a Feast

Me want to cook big feast for family
when they come back from long trip,
but no way can cook enough all by self.
Need somebody help please!
Creature of the Depths

In the dead of night, trading ships are
being pulled down into the depths by
a powerful monster. We need some
merc help to take care of the beast.
Lifesaving

Someone got tangled up in the
salvaging crane's cable, and the
situation's precarious! We need
somebody to get them out of there!
Woodworking

My colleague Igor up at the lumberyard
has gone and got himself injured. Can
you help him out cutting up the wood?
Modeling Work

I'm thinking of painting some artwork
featuring the natural environments of
Gula. Would you mind modeling
for some of my sketches?
Landslide Prevention

It's been raining for days in the town of
Blakka. Which is nice in some ways, but
there's a risk of landslides and flooding.
I need an escort while I investigate.
Harvest Help

Bumper crop bring problems, namely
getting fruit off trees before it spoil.
Can you help with harvest?
Field Devastation

Lately after nightfall, Bunnits appear
and devastate the crops. Could you
drive them off for us?
Mannam Juice Delivery

We want to deliver Mannam Juice to
the village of Pom, but it's dangerous
lately. Could you provide protection?
Wood Gathering

I need special wood from a tree deep in
Inigo Forest for a special furniture
order for an Superbian senator. Could
the mercs get some for me?
Armu Retrieval

One of our transport Armus ran off and
got lost on the way to Pom Village.
Could you find it before a monster gets
to it and deliver it to the village?
Test of Courage

I'm heading up to Lake Earl after
dark on a dare. I'm not scared at all,
but an extra pair of keen eyes couldn't
hurt, so you can come along if you like!
Forest Fire Prevention

There was a lightning strike in Inigo
Forest. I need to get up there quickly
to make sure it didn't start a wildfire,
so could you provide a guard escort?
Stranded Merchant

A merchant fell from a cliff on the way
to Torigo from Lasanne Village.
He's injured and can't move, so could
you send someone to rescue him?
Gula Secret Area

I've heard tell of a special place in
Gula and I want to see it before
I die. But I'm no fighter, so I'll need
some professional protection.
Protect the Holy Place

Suspicious intruders have been sighted
at the sacred grounds in Kizan Valley.
We need mercenary help to get rid of
them before they defile the holy place.
Phonex Escort

Us Phonexes are herbivores, so fighting
isn't really our strong suit. Could you
protect us from Sauros while we're
on the move to a new settlement?
Mock Maneuvers

The soldiers are getting complacent
lately, so I want you to face them in
some mock maneuvers. Don't hold
back - give them a proper challenge!
Arrest Warrant

Thieves have been raiding the village of
Pom for its famous fruit. If we don't do
something, our crops in Torigo might
be next in line. Could you investigate?
Rebel Purge

We received intel of an anti-imperial
faction lurking in Gula, so we want
to round up the ringleaders. We need
your help in case things get violent.
Wine Delivery

We want to take some of Pom Village's
local wine to the town of Blakka, but
we're worried about monster attacks...
Could you protect the delivery?
Phantom Fruit

There's said to be a fruit on Gula
Plateau that can treat any sickness.
Could you go fetch some? And take
care not to damage the plant itself.
Weird Water

The water's got a strange taste and
smell. It's even making some people
sick. Go upstream into Sheeno Forest
and get to the bottom of things.
Flotsam Inspection

Flotsam that the Divine Beast swallows ends
up in a cave in its mouth. Check there's
nothing dangerous in there. Whatever
you find, leave it and report back here.
Lost and Found

We started a service searching for stuff
people lost on their travels, but it's got
so popular now, we can't keep up with
demand. Could you lend us any help?
Containing the Chaos

Made funny Igna with eyepatch and
Electric Blade angry! Bash it up before
Eye of Shining Justice levels village!
Beautiful Pearl

The latest trend in Fons Maim is to
give a pearl ornament to your beloved.
I want to choose one for my own
sweetheart, but I need a lady's opinion!
Igna Investigation

Igna numbers are on the rise, and we're
seeing twice as many as usual on Dinar
Road. We need some capable mercs to
bring the Igna population under control.
Rogue Miners

There's been a sharp rise in unlicensed
Topprea Ore miners. Orders from the
capital are to tighten up enforcement,
so could you go on regular patrols?
Warehouse Work

The food storehouse is getting a little
packed lately. Luckily, we've secured
a bunch of non-perishables, so can you
help us clear out the old produce?
King of the Spring

Seems a group of kids spotted a
gigantic fish. Which mercenary group
will be the first to catch it?
Daily Training

Mercenaries need to train their bodies
and battle technique. Nothing beats a
little sparring with other merc groups,
so join us for an all-out clash!
Giant Crab Attack

Overgrown Crustips are rampaging
through Mantaal to the south of
Fons Maim. Could you get some
mercs to clear them up?
Goods Transport

Seems there's a large amount of cargo
at the military port. The warehouse is
short on staff, so they're behind
schedule. Could you help them out?
Art Supplies

I've been hired to paint a portrait of
Queen Lagert, but I've run out of
pigment. Could you get some Tricolor
Rock for me? I need quite a lot of it.
Water Quality Check

The water supply's tainted with dirt,
and we don't know where along the
channel it's coming from. I'll check the
inner stretch; can you look further out?
Wonderful Stage

The Lumeria Theater Troupe is touring
Invidia and has arrived in Kannina.
They are bit behind setting up their
theater, could you give them a hand?
Road Repairs

The Onda road bridge, that connects to
Mantaal, has been damaged in a freak
storm. We've got materials but need
some help with the repairs.
Rainbow Shell

They make crockery in Invidia out of 
shells and such. The nicer the material,
the more expensive it is. Could you get
me some top-notch dishes and plates?
Rare Goods Repairs

My meter, which you can only get
through salvaging, has given up the
ghost. Parts are expensive too, so do
you have a Blade who could fix it?
Dream of Rice

Invidia does plenty of research on rice
as it's their main crop, but research in
Fons Maim has ground to a halt. Can
you send Blades with plant expertise?
Fort Rescue

Igna forces attacking Volda Fort!
This rate, Invidian soldiermen get
wipe out. Send mercenary help!
Source Security

Lots of Brogs are showing up near
Mantaal's water source. They might
end up with water shortages, so we
need mercs to clear them out.
Cooking Spices

We need fruit to make the spices for
our meat. We can get more from the
Hanzac Plains, but there are too many
monsters there, so could you go for us?
Lunch of Love

I made a packed lunch for my dad who
works up at Mine No. 2. There are
monsters on the road, so I don't want
to risk it. Would you take it?
Divine Beast Weaponry

We're being plagued by Parisax which
are trouble for the Divine Beast weaponry.
Burning Bibli Grass might ward them
off. Would you go and try it yourself?
VIP Escort

A VIP is headed to an important
meeting at Alba Margen. It's a lady
from the industrial city of Yukrit, so
female bodyguards will be needed.
Pest Extermination

A restaurant owner went to harvest
some crops for ingredients and found
a monster devouring them. Get up there
before they're all gone!
Gondola Inspection

A cable car that carries goods needs
inspecting, but I'm not too good with
heights... You wouldn't mind finding
someone else, would you?
Nopon Letter

Lots of letters. Too many! Not carry
all to Yukrit ponself... You trusty type!
Help me carry letters?
Antique Judgment

I was carrying some goods, and I
managed to get some real antiques
mixed up with fakes. I need someone
to sort the real ones from the fakes.
Burned Wanted Posters

Seems some wanted posters for rebel
groups have been burned. It's obvious
who is responsible. This treason should
be investigated promptly.
Mining Machine

Maintenance of a machine at the mine
was overlooked, and now it's broken,
delaying work there. We need several
people to help get it fixed sharpish.
Divine Beast Research

Researchers plan to do a wide-ranging
study into the life span of the Superbian
Divine Beast. We need some well-qualified
people to help with their protection.
Longing for Meleph

I long to be a Driver like Meleph-sama!
I want to be able to use a powerful
Blade like she uses Kagutsuchi-sama.
Please train me!
Illegal Dumper

I want to promote the recycling of
scrap in the industrial city of Yukrit, but
I need help exposing the endless illegal
dumping taking place in the Cloud Sea.
Acquiring Rare Parts

The mine's ether boiler is broken.
I need a veteran salvager to go out and
get the special parts needed to fix it.
Street Patrols

People feel unsafe due to recent thefts.
We don't know who's responsible, so
we need to put on extra patrols to
prevent another incident.
Scientific Development

Research is proceeding at such a fast
pace that I need to get the latest data
from the researchers. Please collect it
immediately.
Hot Nopon

Meh, meh, meh! So hot I melt!
Need chilling for whole body! Quick!
Smuggler Arrest

Got an anonymous tip-off about some
weapons smugglers. Need your mercs'
help with rounding them up. Just arrest
them as soon as you spot them.
Volff Tricks

Some containers were attacked by
Volff during the night, damaging the
lids and locks. There's a lot to fix, so I
need some help to get it done quickly.
Spooky Spirits

Every night, a crying woman's voice
rings out through the back alleys, and
there are sightings of a shadowy long-
haired figure. Could it be a gh...gh...?!
Graveside Flowers

I want to use some blue flowers that
only grow on Lonaria Island to place
on my wife's grave. Do you think you
could go and pick some for me?
Heavy Angling

An ultra-rare and tasty fish has been
spotted at Baldotas Isle! She's a
whopper though, so I'll need someone's
help reeling her in!
Lost Property

Some naughty village children went to
Lake Pololon and left some things up
there. It's a dangerous place, so could
you fetch them for us?
Field Pests

Pests are causing me problems. I need
monster ooze and some fruit to make
pesticide. Can you get me the ooze
while I get the fruit?
Taminbi Theft

Several of the precious Taminbi root
have been stolen from the field, but
that stuff's needed to make medicine.
Those kids need to be taught a lesson!
Insect Professor

I'm creating insect specimens, but I'm
having trouble finding the insect I'm
currently searching for. Could you get
an insect expert to come with me?
Parisax Extermination

Parisax have been bursting out of
Iyasaki's spring. Those pests need
taking care of to protect the water
source.
Pending Payout

We've been trying a bit of salvaging!
We found a treasure trove, but can't
get it open... Wonder if you could help...
Shellfish Savior

The Kamakura Shellfish is one of
Liberalitas's rare treasures, but it's being
overfished by outlaws. Could you
persuade the traders to stop this?
Vessel Scrapping

A wreck washed up at the port, but
it's too big for the men to handle.
Could you provide some people to
help scrap it?
Memory Bracelet

When I was attacked by Quadwings out
in the fields, they got hold of the
bracelet I keep as a memento of my
Granny... I need to get it back!
Rex's Condition

Correl wants to know how you're
getting on, Rex. Why don't you go
and see her and tell her yourself?
Research Results

I'm a researcher from Superbia. I've
found that smaller Cloud Sea lifeforms
are increasing in size. Could you deliver
my report to my professor back home?
Suspicious Ship

Suspicious ships have been seen at
Wreckage Island... It could be the rebel
base. Our forces will investigate, so
we'd appreciate your mercs' help!
Dringworm Hunting

Emi Island, home to Kisra Village,
is being damaged by Dringworms.
We need to do something about them
before they sink the whole Divine Beast!
Yashima Festival

A festival is held on Yashima Plateau
where the Divine Beast lights are so beautiful
at night. The latest festival isn't ready
yet. Could you help with preparations?
Energy Investigation

A researcher is coming to study
whether the Divine Beast's electrical energy
can be used. Can't be too careful so we
need your mercs to accompany him.
Night Visitors

One night, I saw several shadowy
figures lurking just outside Iyasaki.
Please protect the villagers till we
can get to the bottom of this!
Elpys Investigation

I know it's a dangerous place, but I
want to investigate the Spirit Crucible
Elpys. Could you escort us until we're
somewhere we'll be safe?
Cloud Sea Noises

I've heard mysterious sounds on the
Lud Cloudway. Maybe it's just a
monster, but it's still unusual, so could
you lie in wait and find out?
Ether Furnace Checks

We need more people to help with the
scheduled inspection of Teos Aure's
ether furnaces. We can't let them break
down, so could you spare some mercs?
Children's Snowsuit

I want to make some warm snowsuits
out of Fresh Rodonya pelts for the
children. Could you go out and hunt
some down for me?
Snow Removal

The dome roofs in the town keep us
covered, but outside the bridge is deep
in snow. We need to clear the way, so
we need someone powerful to help us.
Exiting Luxuria

Our contract for Nopon Trade Guild
goods has been updated, and we have
to head to Nardron Trade Guild. We
need an escort as we leave the country.
Warming Stralu

I need some Urus meat as a filling
to make some warming Stralu, but it's
calving season, so they're pretty
aggressive now. Happy hunting!
Snow Flower

A crystalline flower on Narlia Drifts
is used in Teos Aure as a medicinal
infusion. Our supply has run out, so
could you pick some more for us?
Carnivorous Beast

The Luxuria army is checking the Gogol
nest on Sevell Cliffs to see if they can
make things safer. Gogols are vicious
so they could use some help, I expect.
New Book

I'm always reading, so much so that
I've read almost every novel in the
Library Philosofia. Think you could
find me a new one to read?
Blizzard Zone

The Nyoka Drifts are usually plagued
by such blizzards that it's impossible
to enter. But rumor has it the snow has
begun melting. Can you look into why?
Cold-Proof Crops

In Luxuria, it's hard to grow crops
because of the cold. I'd like you to find
some cold resistant seeds, so we can
grow ourselves some food.
Military Training

Military training takes place periodically
in the capital Teos Aure. I'm interested
in the mercs' training, so would there
be a chance to train together?
The Black Market

There's a shop that deals in illegal
trade with other countries. There's
fears of a large scale cover up. So
could you send the mercs undercover?
Dandes Salt Cave

Most of the country's salt comes from
Dandes Salt Cave, but recently Aligo
have moved in there. Could you get rid
of them before we run out of salt?
Snow Survey

I want to survey snow depths on the
Nary Cliffs, but there are so many
monsters on the mountain paths. Could
you escort me?
Shaking Icicles

There are lots of massive icicles in Colt
Ravine, many of which have fallen and
injured people in the past. We need to
take care of this threat. Will you help?
Confidential Documents

Super-secret plans for new board game
have been stolen! Find naughty person
before they sell precious information!
Book Writing

I'm in a slump and haven't had any
inspiration for material for my book.
I need some new experiences, so would
you take me on an adventure?
World in a Book

I had a dream that one day the borders
would be opened, but actually that
sounds pretty scary... Could someone
tell me about the world outside?
Ice Hunter

A platoon training in the Norb
Mountains entered the Volff hunting
grounds, resulting in injuries.
Could you send a merc rescue party?
Mysterious Lifeform

A monster not native to Luxuria has
been spotted at Dandes Salt Cave.
Take care of it before it starts
damaging the local ecosystem.
Long-Awaited Work

We're sending latest novel of great
Nopon writer, Pippin, to Gula. Need
you to protect it, so we don't miss out
on Sweet Bean Ohagi they send back!
Cooking Display

Cooking spices from Invidia are getting
popular, which means higher prices.
I want to set up a trading contract
before the other shops!
New Sounds

A region of Superbia has some fine
traditional instruments I would like to
trade in. Could you escort me there?
First Class Freshness!

I want to import fresh fish and
cosmetics from Liberalitas, but there are
lots of monsters on the routes. I need
those trade routes safe and secured.
Old Routes

Information about trading routes to
Luxuria needs updating if we're going
to reopen trade. Could you have a look
and check if they're safe?
Turf War Protection

The trading routes I'm looking at are
right in the middle of a salvager turf
war. To be on the safe side, could you
escort me?
Raddon Family

Raddon Family pirates appeared on
a trade route connecting Superbia
and Gula and attacked a ship!
Could you protect me from danger?
Renowned Goods

Liberalitan goods are renowned for their
handmade quality, so I want to import
large amounts. I'm short a few guards,
so could you lend a hand?
The Water City

Traders from Fons Maim in Invidia are
bringing things like art works and
instruments. I want to trade for them.
Farming Tech

Fruit and meat from Luxuria for use as
medicine ingredients can be imported
as cosmetic sets. Wonder if we'll need
guards for the on-site quality checks.
Fad Foods

Some sweets and healthy foods are
really popular with ladies in Avaritia.
I want to import some, so could you
search out trade routes for me?
Bumper Crop

Seems Torigo gets bumper crops.
I'm off to negotiate the purchase of
books about Gula cuisine, so
I need some protection on the road.
Shipping Lanes Closed

Shipping lanes to Liberalitas are under
attack from monsters. Many ships have
been wrecked and are now in the way,
so could you help clear them away?
Secret Route

I want to start importing food and
books using a secret route to Luxuria
via a Nopon merchant, but I'll need
someone to guard the Nopon.
Beneath the Cloud Sea

I want to gradually resume trade with
Superbia. I'll start with artworks and
food, so I need to find whether there's
anyone there with similar objectives.
Secret Spice

I visited Torigo and can't forget the
food and music there... I'll just have to
go and study there! Would you
accompany me to Torigo?
Shipyard Security

I want to make a ship to use to trade
with Avaritia, but lots of monsters are
appearing near the shipyard. Can you
clear them out so I can get to work?
Shipping Lane Safety

Lexos have appeared on the shipping
lane to Liberalitas. I need to transport
artworks safely, so could you sort them
out for me?
White and Cold

Sailors out trading in Luxuria have been
suffering from the cold. I need to get
some warm coats to them. Could you
collect the materials I need?
Cold Storage

I want to import fish and ingredients
for sweets from Invidia, but I fear they
might spoil in Superbia's climate.
Do you know how to avoid that?
Nopon Cooking

A Nopon who lives in Avaritia knows
a new cooking technique. There must
be others, so could you see if you could
find some other techniques?
Merchant Ship

The Tirkin have been getting up to
mischief on a ship preparing to trade
with Superbia, and now it's broken
down. Could you drive them off?
Ship Lane Lighting

The shipping lane to Invidia is dark, so
we're affixing new lighting to ships.
This job takes a head for heights.
Can you help?
Wagon Guard

Pom Village is famed for its fruit juice
and handicrafts. I want to see what
they're making in Iyasaki, so can you
help protect us on the road there?
Sinking Storehouse?

There's a storehouse I was planning on
using for goods from Luxuria, but
monsters have moved in there. Could I
ask you to get rid of them for me?
Frozen Door

The door to a port that used to be
used for trade has been frozen shut, so
we can't get in for repairs. Could you
help us melt the ice on the door?
Weathered Ship

I want to strengthen the ships trading
with Liberalitas, but we need someone to
defeat the giant Eks at the place where
we can get the materials we need.
Cuisine Researcher

There are lots of restaurants in Fons Maim, so I want to develop a food that
can be eaten while you walk! I wonder
if anyone can help me with that...
Beat the Heat

I want to trade with Superbia, but I
hear their Divine Beast's too hot. I'm worried
people will suffer from the heat, so I
need someone to help me beat it.
Crafty Developments

Gula's renowned for its dyes, and
Luxuria for its textiles... I'd like to invent
some new product combining the two!
Can you help me find some specialists?
Latest Craze

Certain musical instruments are all the
rage in Avaritia at the moment. I want
to sell them in Fons Maim too, so can
you find me an instrument merchant?
Find Akatsuki

We couldn't get any help from Stole.
Let's look for clues as to Akatsuki's
whereabouts ourselves.
巨神獣兵器の輸送

港湾都市チルソナスに神獣兵器を
輸送するための人員が必要になった。
輸送に長けた傭兵を数人派遣してもらいたい
On the Son's Trail!

Son, Solala, still not come home. Need
someone to find clues where he is...

Meh?
Know where Solala is?
Smuggle the Scholar

Dispatch members to help give
protection and guidance as Hassane
is smuggled into Invidia.

So this is Invidia!
I will head to Hræsvelgr at once to
investigate the murals of which I spoke.
Stolen Data

A spy fleeing the Imperial Army has
hidden stolen data on a Noog Skeeter.
Identify the monster in question so we
can recover the data.

There's reportedly one particular critter
which moves slower than the rest.
This warrants further investigation!
Gulan Fugitive

Garlo, the Gulan merc who stole
the Jeweled Signet, has fled into
Gula. We need info on his location
found quickly and discreetly.

It seems like Garlo is hiding out in
Torigo. Let's go track him down.
Skillful Doctor

I need you to find a doctor who can
cure my grandpa. Don't tell him about
it though.

There's an excellent doctor in Superbia's capital, Alba Margen?
I hope he can help Grandpa get well...
Medicine Knowledge

No... I don't have enough help.
Give me some personnel.

I've completed a highly effective
medicine. Take it quickly to the
patient.
Three Parts

Need three parts to open Bahn
treasure trove! Find some clue!

Meh meh!
Know where parts is?
Knew you would!
ルクスリア兵士の護衛任務

ゲンブ頭部に兵士を駐屯させるため、
ルクスリア部隊の護衛を頼みたい。

It's good you arrived at Genbu Crown...
We're in a spot of trouble. Could you
come here?
Shipbuilding Wood

Good quality wood is indispensable
for building robust ships! I'd like you
to help me gather some for Umon's
new ship.

Seems you got some wood that'll last
many a year in the wind and rain.
Now to start prepping it for the build.
Craftsman's Skills

This wood you gathered is good stuff,
but if we mess up the prep, it'll all
go to waste. I need you to prep the
wood carefully.

Now that the wood is prepped, we can
think about the next step in the build.
Next we'll start with the construction.
Divine Beast Shipbuilding

The last part of the build is the
construction. You need to assemble the
prepped wood on the Divine Beast, and then
the ship should be complete.

Now that's what I call a Divine Beast ship!
Let Umon know the news!
Direct Line Escort

It'd be a big help if you could help
protect the ship directly connecting
Avaritia and Iyasaki from monster
attacks...
Energy for Remodeling

Equipment used for Hana remodel
not work! Need you find energy item!

Now energy full!
Thanks!
Brought to Justice 1

Defeat the first evil in the shadows of
Alba Margen: thugs threatening
beatings. (Requires Vasara as leader.)

You've rid the shadows of Alba
Cavanich of the first evil.
Brought to Justice 2

Defeat the second evil in the shadows
of Alba Margen: loan sharks.
(Requires Vasara as leader.)

You've rid the shadows of Alba
Cavanich of the second evil.
Brought to Justice 3

Defeat the third evil in the shadows of
Alba Margen: medical help fraudsters.
(Requires Vasara as leader.)

You've rid the shadows of Alba
Cavanich of the third evil.
Brought to Justice 4

Defeat the fourth evil in the shadows of
Alba Margen: self-injuring fraudsters.
(Requires Vasara as leader.)

You've rid the shadows of Alba
Cavanich of the fourth evil.
Hear Vasara's detailed report
at Jakolo's Inn in Superbia.
Unjust Organization

Gather data on a band of assassins,
the Bloody Lobsters, and find out
what they're up to.
(Requires Vasara as leader.)

So the Bloody Lobsters' next target is
Punin of the Avaritia Trade Guild...
The Beast of Rigideria

Find out information about the demon
who destroyed the small kingdom
known as Rigideria which once existed
in Temperantia!

It seems that troops with the imperial
forces stationed in Temperantia have
sighted a strange beast.
False Rumor

We've put out a false rumor of a
delivery of a large number of Core
Crystals to catch a band of thieves who
are after them. Can you lure them out?

The rumor has spread far enough for
the thieves to have heard it...
Get ready for a fight.
Ambush

The rumors have lured the thieves to
two locations. Dispatch your mercs as
a support group for the Department of
Safety in the fight.

We defeated half the enemy forces, but
we didn't escape without injury... Get
more details from Ienamo.
Child Disappearances

We need to gather information to work
out how to stop those responsible for
Avaritia's child disappearances.
(Requires Tokiha as leader.)

It seems like the child disappearances
are happening in Invidia too.
Come to Fons Maim Port and I'll
fill you in on the details.
Surveillance

I want you to monitor a suspicious
group that's been seen around Invidia,
particularly in Fons Maim, recently.
(Requires Azami as leader.)

It was so lonely by myself...
I just wanted to be with my
darling cutie Driver...
Leg it!

The mercs fled in the confusion caused
by Azami's attack. Find where they've
got to and round them up.

The mercs were hiding on Wreckage
Island in Liberalitas, I see...
Vocal Lesson 1

Must study how project voice in
big, big hall place!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Sing and dance make fan happy.
Must study rhythm feeling!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Write own songs is best.
Now must study lyric writing!

Write own songs is best.

Stylishness all in detail!
Must study fashion!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Looks Lesson 2

Teach you legendary Nopon dance.
Dancing all about boogie!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Looks Lesson 3

Looks important for pop stars.
Must study makeup!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Looks Lesson 4

Must keep active to stay in shape!
Keeps healthy too! Kill two Nopon
with one bone!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Looks Lesson 5

Hm, need own pose too?
Must study posing!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Soul Lesson 1

Waterfall meditation is thing.
Meditate in Invidian waterfall!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Soul Lesson 2

Find peace in high place is good if not
scared of height. No look down!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Soul Lesson 3

Must hand out leaflets. Meeting people
good for confidence! No be shy!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Soul Lesson 4

Ghost in Superbia...
Find ghost and prove courage!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Soul Lesson 5

Hear cross-legged meditation good.
Hurt legs though. Ouch!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)
Sparkly Costumes

Must make concert costume.
Speak to designer!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Meh?
Not bit different? But Nanakoori thought
suited best...
Song Selection

Got meeting in concert city, Drewey,
about songs sing there!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Sing songs settled!
Good songs for Nanakoori. Will be fun!
Luxury Stage

Make concert big spectacle!
Get sparkly stage decorations from
Liberalitas!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

No worry, me put decorations up!
Will be great show! Tapz excited too!
Rehearsal

Last prep before concert.
Rehearse in Nharil Central Plaza!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Tapz get nervy...
Nervy and butterflies in intestines!
Holy Choir

Choir need special guest! So excited
for singing with them. Not keep choir
waiting!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Choir singing wonderful. Cleansed my
soul. Excited for next time!
Fashion Show

Been invited to fashion show!
Frilly... Fluffy... Many pretty clothes!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Nanakoori wear new clothes, so cute!
Get many new fan, no doubt!
Meet and Greet

Must attend meet and greet for
die-hard fan!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Fan look very happy!
Must do best for loyal fan!
Concert in Avaritia

Live concert on Goldmund trade
ship! Meet in Goldmund!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Concert not well-liked, but at least
pulled it off! Got fan club off ground
too.
Concert in Invidia

Live concert in Invidia!
Meet at Bajena Playhouse!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Great success!
Much emotioning to beautiful singing!
Popularity skyrocket!
Concert in Superbia

Live concert in Superbia!
Meet at Nharil Central Plaza!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

End pop star career very sad.
Tapz be biggest fan of Nanakoori for ever!
Nopon Pop Stars

Momon Trade Guild need singer!
All very excited.
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Momon Trade Guild very happy.
Tapz very proud too!
Keep up good work!

Live concert on street in Pom Village.
Pom Village fruit very yum-yum!

Pom Villager all very happy. Full of

Too full...
Stage Star

Live concert on stage in Drewey.
But scout came from stage group.
What Tapz do?
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Was looking for pop stars, but want
see Nanakoori sing and dance on stage.
Summer Concert

Live concert on Yukrit street. Be very
hot! Concert burn up maybe!

Much hotter than thought...
Very hot and sweaty concert...
Benefit Concert

Acedia refugees deeply sad...
But song help cheery up!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Many crying when hear Nanakoori sing...
Tough but hope get better for them...
Invitation from Queen

Queen Lagert ask for singing at palace!
So surprised me think joke!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Queen much into music! Think get
many Invidian fan!
Invitation from Emperor

Have loyal Superbian soldier fan!
Give concert at palace for them!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Very nervy in palace, but think get
many Superbian fan!
Special Concert

Finally got 4,000 fan!
Give thanking concert for big number!
(Requires Nanakoori as leader.)

Meh meh! Very many fan!
Nanakoori amazing!
Black Nopon Search

Find out where that black-feathered
fool who tricked us is!
(Requires Rinne as leader.)

The black-feathered fool is hiding on
the streets of Superbia?
Our entourage will not forgive this...
Rinne's Tea Party 1

We're throwing a party for the girls!
We'll be able to chat to our hearts'
content and get things off our chests...
(Requires Rinne as leader.)

That went well. Good to see a smile
on all the girls' faces...
Thank you for all your help with this.
Rinne's Tea Party 2

We're throwing a party for the girls!
We'll be able to chat to our hearts'
content and get things off our chests...
(Requires Rinne as leader.)

That went well. We'd go to any trouble
to put smiles on all the girls' faces...
Rinne's Tea Party 3

We're throwing a party for the girls!
We'll be able to chat to our hearts'
content and get things off our chests...
(Requires Rinne as leader.)

That went well. We don't require

Rinne's Tea Party 4

We're throwing a party for the girls!
We'll be able to chat to our hearts'
content and get things off our chests...
(Requires Rinne as leader.)

That went well. Now our entourage

Rinne's Tea Party 5

We're throwing a party for the girls!
We'll be able to chat to our hearts'
content and get things off our chests...
(Requires Rinne as leader.)

All good things must come to an end...
Oh that reminds me, apparently there's

Shiki's Password

I'll analyze the glowing tablet!
I'm determined to solve the mystery!
(Requires Shiki as leader.)

I heard about someone with an old
book about the tablet. Let's go and
see if they'll let us take a look!
Yaegiri's Enemy 1

A monster has appeared in Avaritia's
Cloud Sea! Wonder if it'll be a
challenge? (Requires Yaegiri as leader.)

Not as strong as I thought it would be.
Let's find something tougher to take on!
Yaegiri's Enemy 2

A monster has appeared in the Gula

(Requires Yaegiri as leader.)

Not as strong as I thought it would be.
Let's find something tougher to take on!

A monster has appeared in Invidia!
Wonder if it'll be a challenge?
(Requires Yaegiri as leader.)

Not as strong as I thought it would be.
Let's find something tougher to take on!
Yaegiri's Enemy 4

A monster has appeared in the Superbia
mines! Wonder if it'll be a
challenge? (Req. Yaegiri as leader.)

Not as strong as I thought it would be.
Let's find something tougher to take on!
We Need To Talk!

Drivers, Hikari, I need a word with
you! Let's assemble in Avaritia's
Goldmund Residential District!
(Requires Yaegiri as leader.)

Ahh, feels good to get things off your
chest! Well? Come on! We gotta find a
monstrous monster or something!
Tirkin Kountess 1

Where kountess go?
Find info about where kountess
in Gula is! Craa!

Kountess not in Gula! Craa!
Look somewhere else!

Where kountess go?
Find info about where kountess

Kountess not in Superbia! Craa!

Ten'i Search

We pushed Ten'i too hard...
We can't abandon an important ally
like her, so let's track her down.

Ten'i's in Spirt Crucible Elpys, but
can't get her power under control.
We need to help her!
Manufacture Help

Not enough worker...
Give share of Nopopomouli if help
with big manufacture job!
Tome of Mors Vol. 2

I'll decipher Tome of Mors Vol. 2.
Now what do we have here...
(Requires Shiki as leader.)

Hmmmm... Just the one tome isn't
telling me much. I think we're going
to need the other volumes.
Tome of Mors Vol. 4

I'll decipher Tome of Mors Vol. 4.
Wonder what's in this one...
(Requires Shiki as leader.)

That's half of the tomes deciphered.
But there are still so many mysteries
I'll never solve without the other two.
Tome of Mors Vol. 3

I'll decipher Tome of Mors Vol. 3.
Looking forward to reading this one...
(Requires Shiki as leader.)

Hmm... These tomes seem to hold some
very interesting information. If only I
had the final piece of the puzzle...
Tome of Mors Vol. 1

I'll decipher Tome of Mors Vol. 1.
Let me look. I'll have it done in no time.
(Requires Shiki as leader.)

Oh my...this is an incredible discovery!
Listen, everyone - you won't believe
what these tomes were hiding.
Allies of Justice 1

Shop gone...
What to do?
(Requires Glen as leader.)

Not be tricked!
Thanks for getting back!
You big help!
Allies of Justice 2

My child has gone missing in the
Gulan woods... I wish someone
would help me look.
(Requires Glen as leader.)

Thank you so much for finding my
baby! I'll never let them out of my
sight again. Once more, thank you!
Allies of Justice 3

My father disappeared all of a sudden.
Wonder what happened to him...
(Requires Glen as leader.)

There was a monster blocking the way?
Oh, you're so strong! And cool!
Allies of Justice 4

Lugging veg gets harder as you get
older...
No young folk to help though...
(Requires Glen as leader.)

Such a strong boy...
You were such a big help. How about
some home-cooked grub as a reward?
Allies of Justice 5

I'd almost made it as a researcher,
then my data got stolen...
(Requires Glen as leader.)

Thanks for getting my research data
back. I think I'll follow your positive
outlook on life from now on!
Allies of Justice 6

When I'm a grown up, I'll be so strong
no Blade could beat me, and I'll be
kind and help people.
Can't Escape

I need someone to catch some mercs
hiding on Liberalitas's Wreckage Island.
I want to be with my darling Driver.

So they've already moved on?
That's a shame, but could you keep
looking for me?
Obstinate Pursuit

I need someone to track the mercs who
fled Liberalitas.
I want to be with my darling Driver.

So the mercs went to the town of
Mirma in Gula...
We'll get them next time.
Chase Is On

I need you to catch the mercs who
went to Mirma in Gula.
I want to be with my darling Driver.

Those mercs sure are fast, but they've
no place to run.
Ha! You'll have to punish them well.
Got 'Em

Need to punish those kids who were
getting in my darling Driver's way.
(Requires Azami as leader.)

Hahaha...
Naughty children who stand between
me and my darling Driver will get a
thousand lashes as punishment.
Fake Vase

It seems there's an underhanded
merchant illegally selling fake goods
at high prices. Bring in the fraudster.

The Nopon merchant you brought in
has been safely extradited to Avaritia.
Thanks for catching him.
Beautiful Flower

Seems there are lots of random attacks
happening in Invidia. According to our
info, the likely culprit is a beautiful
female Blade. Find her and catch her.

We've handed the suspect over to the
Invidian army. She may be beautiful, but
there's no way we'll go easy on her.
Unreturnable Money

Word is there's a trader offering loans
to refugees with illegally high interest
rates. Bring 'em in.

We've handed the trader over to the
Superbian army. We can't permit people
to take advantage of vulnerable
refugees.
Round Up

They say a big deal is going down
between illegal traders in Superbia.
Now's the chance to catch two crime
bosses.

The bosses of those big criminal
organizations have been extradited
to their own countries...
Things should quieten down now.
First Mission

Did you see the Ansel near Hræsvelgr?
If it ever looks like it's going to get in...
Could you make sure that it doesn't?

So you took care of the Ansel?
Nice one! Your efforts have won
the villagers another day of peace.
Materials Stakeout

We need someone to keep watch over
the green and yellow barrels holding
artificial Blade materials.

Looks like some Nopon carried them
off somewhere. Head back to the inn
to discuss the details.
Whose Pendant?

Just who was the woman who gave
Gheena that pendant...?
We should find out some more details!

So it was an Superbian merc who gave
Gheena the pendant. Wonder where she
is now...
The Pendant's Owner

I've heard someone's seen the woman
who gave Gheena the pendant in Superbia! Let's track down the source of
the rumor and find out the details.

Apparently the merc was tortured to
death... Just how important can this
document be?
Document of Worth

That merc thought this document was
worth protecting with her life...
Just what does it say, though? Do you
know anybody who could read it?

We can't let them get away with this
plan! If I act as bait, we should be able
to lure the mastermind out...
Bait Battle

So I'm the bait to lure the villains out.
Are you worried for me? It's okay, I'll be
fine! (Requires Hotaru as leader.)

Thanks to all your efforts we've
managed to catch the mastermind.
Thank you all for your help!
Everyone Loves Hotaru

If we just have a chat, everything will
be fine! I'll do the talking!
(Requires Hotaru as leader.)

Well, turns out that after a little chat,
they're really nice and are now a big
fan of mine! They won't attack any
more.

We discovered that there's a hideout
for the anti-Superbian organization
Brionac near Bellyfull Canteen at the
old factory. We should investigate.
New Business

Now Luxuria have opened their borders,
I want to start trading with them, but I
don't have a partner there to trade
with. Could you find me one?

Those are some beautiful dishes right
there! Definitely don't see ones like that
every day... They'll definitely bring my
Roast Meat Tagliata to the next level!

Trial Run 1

As Just Desserts gets more and more
popular, requests keep flooding in from
other countries, and we need to deliver!
(Requires Idaten as leader.)

Welcome back!
Let's hear the report back at
Yuou's Just Desserts.
Trial Run 2

This time, take someone reliable with
you so the desserts actually make it to
their intended recipient.
(Requires Idaten as leader.)

Dessert delivery success!
Hopefully the name of Just Desserts
will spread even further...
Desserts Delivered 1

This is a delivery request for Just
Desserts! We'd like you to take this
delivery to Avaritia!
(Requires Idaten as leader.)
Desserts Delivered 2

This is a delivery request for Just
Desserts! We'd like you to take this
delivery to Gula!
(Requires Idaten as leader.)
Desserts Delivered 3

This is a delivery request for Just
Desserts! We'd like you to take this
delivery to Superbia.
(Requires Idaten as leader.)
Desserts Delivered 4

This is a delivery request for Just
Desserts! We'd like you to take this
delivery to Liberalitas!
(Requires Idaten as leader.)
Desserts Delivered 5

This is a delivery request for Just
Desserts! We'd like you to take this
delivery to Luxuria!
(Requires Idaten as leader.)
Catch a Crook

Be it Tirkins or monsters, it matters not.
The guilty must receive punishment...
(Requires Vasara as leader.)

The fields ought to be safe now...
I will speak in more detail once we
have all gathered again.
Guard the Field

I shall watch over the fields overnight,
lest the culprit come back for seconds!
(Requires Tokiha as leader.)

No veggies were stolen on my watch!
I'll give the whole report when we're all
gathered again.
Extract a Confession

I'll go around Iyasaki and talk to folks!
If I find a witness, I'll take a statement...
If I find the perp, I'll make'em 'fess up!
(Requires Glen as leader.)

I don't think there are any bad guys
in this village... I'll tell you all about it
when we're all gathered again!
Farmin' Life Ain't Easy

After all your help before, I'm still short
o' hands to help wi' the farm. I'd sure 
be indebted to yeh lot if yeh'd help out
a bit here 'n there.
Reclamation

First, we'll need t' till the land a bit.
Yeh need good soil for good veggies, 
like. But remember teh take yeh time 
and show respect to t' land, right?
Seeding

Next is to spread t' seeds 'cross t' land.
Do it carefully, and put yeh hearts into
it, yeh hear?
Growing

If yeh want the best veggies, yeh've
gotta keep on top of t' fertilizer, water,
and keepin' ruddy bugs off 'em. After
that, it's harvestin', which I'll 'andle.
Raiko's Strategy

Leave Pelagic Vincent to Ten'i
and me. The two of us can handle
it if we just work together!

Pelagic Vincent is no more!
Ten'i was so, so strong!
Yaegiri's Strategy

I'll handle Telluric Desirée. I've been
itching for an exciting battle like this!
(Requires Yaegiri as leader.)

That was even more fun than I thought!
Telluric Desirée didn't stand a chance
against me. But now, where will I find
an even more intense fight?!
Lifeline to Temperantia

We transport goods from Superbia to
Temperantia regularly, but we could do
with someone to help guard it all on its
way. Could you handle this for us?
Divine Beast Battleship Fixes

Could you escort our shipment of 
salvage goods from Avaritia? They're
needed to undertake maintenance for 
the Divine Beast battleships.
Crossing Bridges

Trade between Superbia and Luxuria
has begun, but no army members can
be spared, so could we ask you guys to
guard the trade caravans on their way?
Invidian Crash Course

Don't think nobody notices the good 
work you guys do out there. In fact, 
we'd like to have you guys come and
train the fresh Invidian recruits!
Green-Thumbed Mercs

This job is right up your alley! Well, 
maybe not, but who says no to a bit of
gardening? Just be careful; no mistakes
are allowed in Queen Lagert's garden.
Aristocratic Security

This job is right up your alley! The six
noble houses of Invidia will soon gather
to hold an assembly. Security detail
we leave in your capable hands.
Wedding Invitation

Ondina's wedding is coming up real
soon, and to hear her and her fiancé
tell it, they know you guys and would
love to have you at the ceremony.

I wish Bonard could have seen it as
well... One day I'll make sure to take
Ondina and Len to see his grave!
...Though it is on the Superbian side...
Ibuki's Big News

Send your mercs out to look into the
big news Ibuki heard at the inn.

All the information you gathered says
there's an uprising brewing at the 
Hall of Virtue in Theoscaldia Palace.
What are you waiting for? Let's go!
Arach-no-More

A nasty Arachno-like monster has taken
up residence around Dandes Salt Cave.
It's pretty strong, so we want to ask the
best merc group in Alst to take it out.
Showdown at Chilsain

There's a monster like a Sauros near
the harbor of Chilsain. It's too strong 
to handle on our own, so we're asking
the strongest mercs in Alst for help!
Round 2 at Merclibay

Merclibay Islet is beset by extremely
dangerous monsters! STILL! We're
counting on Alst's best merc group
to wipe them out completely!
